solution_line_template: You sold {chocolate_cookies_sold} chocolate cookies at ${price_per_chocolate_cookie} per cookie earning {chocolate_cookies_sold} x {price_per_chocolate_cookie} = $<<{chocolate_cookies_sold}*{price_per_chocolate_cookie}={chocolate_earnings}>>{chocolate_earnings}

You sold {vanilla_cookies_sold} vanilla cookies at ${price_per_vanilla_cookie} per cookie earning {vanilla_cookies_sold} x {price_per_vanilla_cookie} =$<<{vanilla_cookies_sold}*{price_per_vanilla_cookie}={vanilla_earnings}>>{vanilla_earnings}.
